name: Sandworm Javelin
description: The Sandworm Javelin is a variant of theSandworm Spearthat can only be thrown. Considering the Sandworm Javelin deals the same amount of damage as aBone Javelin, the Sandworm Javelin is overshadowed by higher-tier javelins and is not worth the effort. Crafted in batches of five and stacks up to twenty.
